item.momotinker.molten_timetrace_purple_: Molten Time Trace Purple Gold Bucket
item.momotinker.molten_reversetime_purpl: Molten Reverse Time Purple Gold Bucket
recipe.momotinker.modifier.cleansethewor: [Cleanse The World] requires [Breakthrough Stars] as a prerequisite
recipe.momotinker.modifier.shadowofdamna: [Shadow Of Damnation] requires [Cleanse The World] as a prerequisite
recipe.momotinker.modifier.shortterminve: [Short Term Investments] requires [Greedy and plundering] as a prerequisite and is mutually exclusive with [Long Term Investments]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.longterminves: [Long Term Investments] requires [Greedy and plundering] as a prerequisite and is mutually exclusive with [Short Term Investments]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.crimsonqueen: [Crimson Queen] is mutually exclusive with [Dimensional Slash]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.yamato: [Dimensional Slash] is mutually exclusive with [Crimson Queen]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.eternalanger: [Eternal Anger] needs to use [Over anger sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.slackatmosphe: [Slack Atmosphere] needs to use [Over cowardice sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.thepinnacleof: [The Pinnacle Of Arrogance] needs to use [Over disdain sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.filledwithhun: [Filled With Hunger] needs to use [Over eating sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.resentmentkni: [Resentment Knives] needs to use [Over envy sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.forbiddenfrui: [Forbidden Fruit] needs to use [Over indulgence sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.gainsalone: [Gains Alone] needs to use [Over weighting wealth sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
recipe.momotinker.modifier.compassionate: [Compassionate Everything] needs to use [Over sad sin] as a prerequisite and strengthen mutual exclusion with other [Resonance of major sin]
item.momotinker.tooltip.special_acquisit: Press and hold 'shift' to view and retrieve
block.momotinker.tooltip.dimensional_pri: §bWhen a player breaks glass, there is a 6.18% chance that the item will drop§
item.momotinker.tooltip.interdimensional: §dWhen the witherBoss dies at a height greater than or equal to 300 in the world and falls to its location§
The stars twinkled, and shooting stars noticed you as they crossed the horizon, trying to give you a gift
item.momotinker.tooltip.arriving_at_the_: §7Thousands of passing things, all crossing the other shore§
§4When the player's current health value is equal to or less than 1, they receive a single damage equivalent to their maximum life§
item.momotinker.tooltip.heartsteel2: §2When the iron golem kills the warden, it falls to the location where the iron golem is located§
item.momotinker.tooltip.spirit_visage2: §aWhen uses bone powder to ripen any sapling, there is a 2% chance that it will fall to the sapling's location§
item.momotinker.tooltip.gluttony_core1: §2With your soul, forge my flesh and blood§
item.momotinker.tooltip.gluttony_core2: §2When a frog kills a slime, there is a 10% chance that it will drop at the frog's location§
item.momotinker.tooltip.greedy_contract2: §9Any villager with a profession will add this item to the trading list when they reach the master level§
item.momotinker.tooltip.lust_mirror1: §5With your bones, forge my full desires§
item.momotinker.tooltip.lust_mirror2: §5A breeding organism will drop this item at its location after participating in three rounds of breeding, with a maximum of two drops per organism§
item.momotinker.tooltip.arrogance_proof1: §cWith your strike weakly, forge my armor§
item.momotinker.tooltip.arrogance_proof2: §cFalling at the player's location when killing warden without wearing any armor§
item.momotinker.tooltip.rage_stone_statu: §8With your blood, forge my long years§
§8When killing a wolf that has previously killed a sheep and is in a state of anger, it falls to the player's location§
item.momotinker.tooltip.lazy_grail1: §6With your tired of exhaustion, forge my clear soul§
item.momotinker.tooltip.lazy_grail2: §6When the player has slow and weak effects, they will get enough sleep and fall to their location when they wake up§
item.momotinker.tooltip.jealous_notes1: §eWith your abundant resources, forge my thin grievances§
item.momotinker.tooltip.jealous_notes2: §eWhen not equipped with any armor and attacked by creatures equipped with any armor, the writable book in the master's hand will be converted into this item§
item.momotinker.tooltip.compassion_mask1: §7With your tears, forge my sacrificial ceremony§
item.momotinker.tooltip.compassion_mask2: §7When a witch dies due to fall damage, this item will fall to its place of death§
item.momotinker.tooltip.dim_dark_gold1: Mysterious metal from ancient times, its glory and splendor have been buried by time
item.momotinker.tooltip.stained_blood_go: The existence of taboos born after countless killings and the infiltration of vengeful souls
§4Hidden Material: Why Sacred Weapons Should Be Used for Wrong Killings§
item.momotinker.tooltip.starry_mysteriou: Due to the awakening of 'From Brilliance', it shines again and is reborn from the cocoon
item.momotinker.tooltip.devouring_demon_: The extreme will reverse, and excessive enchantment led to the birth of this object
When an anvil around the player hits equipment with an enchanting type greater than or equal to 5, it will be converted into that item
item.momotinker.tooltip.nihilism1: You are just reflections cast by 'existence', and at this moment, it should recede with the tide of dusk
item.momotinker.tooltip.meteor_nucleus1: The stars falling from the sky contain energy that never existed in this world
item.momotinker.tooltip.meteor_nucleus2: Since the player first picks up the 'Interdimensional Crystal', there is a chance for it to fall in the form of a meteor within a 300 grid area centered around the player every period of time
item.momotinker.tooltip.meteor_nucleus3: The metal ingot poured by the melting meteor in the sky contains enormous energy
item.momotinker.tooltip.meteor_nucleus4: 'The core of the meteor can continuously release a large amount of heat energy without any signs of decay after melting, which may provide new assistance in our craftsmanship work'
item.momotinker.tooltip.meteor_nucleus5: The gift of shooting stars is coming soon
item.momotinker.tooltip.ashen_platinum1: Mysterious metal from ancient times, its glory and splendor have been buried by time
item.momotinker.tooltip.hadal_platinum1: After countless eras of being diluted by the bloodline of the deep sea, it finally reappears
item.momotinker.tooltip.stellar_core_pla: The metal carved into creation recalls its mission from beneath the lava of the star core
item.momotinker.tooltip.crystallized_pla: Under the influence of a powerful soul, its structure is reassembled to form a completely new composite material
item.momotinker.tooltip.living_platinum1: The hidden program preset in ancient civilizations was accidentally activated, revealing a bizarre form that mimics living organisms
item.momotinker.tooltip.living_platinum2: §cHidden Material:§oExperimental note A9-23: In order to prevent it from developing consciousness, non intelligent organisms must be fed while ensuring that they are closest to their original form§
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_purple_: Mysterious metal from ancient times, its glory and splendor have been buried by time
item.momotinker.tooltip.timetrace_purple: After multiple uses of time, it finally recalled how to control its abilities
item.momotinker.tooltip.reversetime_purp: Through countless journeys on the brink of collapse, it was able to awaken its ability to be different and different
§5Hidden Material:The strongest and most unintentional wish may receive a different response§
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_ego1: Only employees with all attributes exceeding 110 can pick up this weapon (including accessory bonuses)
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_ego2: This weapon will cause physical, mental, erosion, and soul damage simultaneously.
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_ego3: This weapon can launch a special attack every once in a while
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_ego4: If an employee holds this E.G.O weapon, the End Bird will not appear.
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_ego5: Just like how the ever-watching eyes, the scale that could measure any and all sin, and the beak that could swallow everything protected the peace of the Black Forest...
item.momotinker.tooltip.twilight_ego6: The wielder of this armament may also bring peace as they did.
item.momotinker.tooltip.core_of_felony1: What is my sin, why is my sin, what is my sin for.
item.momotinker.tooltip.core_of_felony2: I am death and life. Darkness and light.
item.momotinker.tooltip.star_seeking_poi: Relying on the resonance and induction between shooting stars, it will guide you
Use this item to search for the closest 'Meteor Nucleus' within 128 grids
The current target location being pursued:(
item.momotinker.tooltip.rhythm_slime1: Oh, look at this little guy
item.momotinker.tooltip.dragon_jade1: A huge gem generated with a very low probability within the extremely long-lived EnderDragon
item.momotinker.tooltip.dragon_jade2: After EnderDragon surviving for over 24000 game ticks, it will drop upon death
block.momotinker.tooltip.lightning_strik: Heaven is yang, earth is yin; Thunder and fire are yang, evil spirits are yin
When red [Jujube Wood] is struck by lightning, it will transform into [Lightning Strike Wood] (requiring a player to be present within 200 squares)
item.momotinker.tooltip.immortal_weiqi1: The axe is all rotten, and the old friends are also gone
item.momotinker.tooltip.immortal_weiqi2: Between midnight and noon the next day, there is a 25% chance that a broken wooden axe will appear at the player's position
item.momotinker.tooltip.mountain_river_p: The freedom in my heart allows me to see the mountains and rivers of the past
When a map is soaked in water, there is a 5% chance that it will change to that item every second (requiring a player to be present within 200 squares)
item.momotinker.trigger_blade.descriptio:
[Two handed weapons]
A melee weapon with special attack techniques.After accumulating power,it can send out a slash.
Initial speed increases slash damage.
Precision will randomly increase damage
[Two handed weapons][From Brilliance]:Lost in the ancient city;
A single type melee weapon with ultra-high attack speed.After accumulating power, it can sprint briefly.
item.momotinker.tooltip.divine_punishmen: undead. The current number of kills is:
The mission of the ancient divine weapon has been completed!This tool will deal an additional 25% magic damage and ignore magic defenses
The hidden mission of ancient divine weapons has been completed!This tool will restore durability if it causes damage, and if the durability is full, it will restore the user's life
item.momotinker.entropy_burning_cube.des:
[From Brilliance]:Lost in Atlantis and the Sleeping Treasure
There is no functional use of the tool itself,and pressing 'Tool Enhancement' can change various forms.
item.momotinker.tooltip.liverization: The hidden mission of ancient divine weapons has been completed!Got a chance to 'Refactor'!
item.momotinker.tooltip.liverization1: Pressing 'Tool Enhancement' while placing any three part  and below tool on the deputy can permanently devour the deputy's equipment and obtain all its reinforcements and material properties,Use with caution!
item.momotinker.tooltip.other: This ancient divine weapon is used to complete other forms of evolution
item.momotinker.entropy_burning_sword.de:
[Two handed weapons]
A wide range melee weapon with high damage but extremely low attack speed,After accumulating power, deal 150% damage to a wide range target (affected by attack speed).
item.momotinker.tooltip.stellarcore1: flame creature. The current number of kills is:
item.momotinker.tooltip.stellarcore2: The mission of the ancient divine weapon has been completed!Attacks cause extra flame damage, with values related to armor and armor resilience.If there is only one target hit by the right-click, the damage will become 300%
item.momotinker.entropy_burning_riding_s:
[Two handed weapons]
Single unit melee weapon with longer attack distance.The damage will increase according to the movement speed.After accumulating power, it can sprint briefly.
item.momotinker.tooltip.entropy_burning_: The current movement speed has increased the total damage:
item.momotinker.tooltip.hadal1: creature on fire. The current number of kills is:
item.momotinker.tooltip.hadal2: The mission of the ancient divine weapon has been completed!Double the damage value based on movement speed and increase the sprint distance in water.Increase the upper limit of damage to 450%
item.momotinker.entropy_burning_cannon.d:
[Two handed weapons]
Can consume experience to initiate shooting, can deal damage to all targets on the path (the more experience consumed, the higher the shooting damage).
item.momotinker.tooltip.crystallized1: witherBoss. The current number of kills is:
item.momotinker.tooltip.crystallized2: The mission of the ancient divine weapon has been completed!Double the shooting distance and slightly increase the number of damage segments
item.momotinker.eclipse_container.descri:
[Two handed weapons]
Only inherit the reinforcement of 'Coronal Key' (including reinforcement points and other of the material),After accumulating power, press and release the 'solar eclipse'.
item.momotinker.tooltip.eclipse_containe: The current attraction range of 'solar eclipse' is:
item.momotinker.coronal_key.description: Continuous combat can increase charging and improve damage. When the charging is full and the deputy is'Moon Lock', pressing 'Tool Enhancement' to merge with it to form an'Eclipse Container'.
item.momotinker.moon_lock.description:
[Non-existent shadow]
During the charging period, 50% damage reduction can be obtained and there is a 50% probability of ignoring projectile attacks.
item.momotinker.pocket_watch.description:
[From Brilliance]:Lost in the End City
Right click to record the location in stealth mode. When the backpack is present, death will be teleported and it will be cooled down(Can be used actively by right clicking, but will not restore life)
item.momotinker.tooltip.transmit2: The mission of the ancient divine weapon has been completed!When used actively, it no longer consumes durability and significantly reduces cooling time, but when the holder dies, the tool will no longer be immune to death and teleportation
item.momotinker.tooltip.backtracking: The hidden mission of ancient divine weapons has been completed!This tool will automatically record the holder's position 5 seconds ago, with a slight reduction in cooldown time, but the tool can no longer autonomously record position and teleportation
item.momotinker.chain_sword.description:
[Two handed weapons]
During use, it can continuously strike small range creatures in front of it. If used for too long, it will cannot be used normally. The higher the attack speed, the higher the damage
item.momotinker.pneumatic_sword.descript: Right click to briefly sprint forward and upward, pressing 'Tool Enhancement' to fire the rope (press 'shift' to cancel the rope in advance). If the target is a creature, it will enhance the next aerial sprint. If the deputy has another pneumatic sword, it will improve various performance
material.momotinker.lazy_grail.encyclope: §6Never be troubled by the urgency of the §6 world
material.momotinker.jealous_notes.encycl: §eJealousy and resentment will never be §e dispelled
material.momotinker.dim_dark_gold.encycl: The exquisite creations shining like stars have long been covered in dust, but...
material.momotinker.stained_blood_gold.e: 'Any violence, any cost, is only for more power'
material.momotinker.starry_mysterious_go: The dim stars began to shine in the sky again, just like the sparkling object in the hand
material.momotinker.ashen_platinum.encyc: Just as countless treasures have fallen into the depths of the sea, the exquisite creations that shine like gems have long been eroded and damaged, but...
material.momotinker.hadal_platinum.encyc: After countless eras of being diluted by the bloodline of the deep sea, it finally reappears
material.momotinker.stellar_core_platinu: The metal carved into creation recalls its mission from beneath the lava of the star core
material.momotinker.crystallized_platinu: Under the influence of a powerful soul, its structure is reassembled to form a completely new composite material
material.momotinker.living_platinum.ency: The hidden program preset in ancient civilizations was accidentally activated, revealing a bizarre form that mimics living organisms
material.momotinker.twilight_purple_gold: Just as the sun will eventually set in the west, the exquisite creations that shine like sunlight have already turned into twilight, but...
material.momotinker.timetrace_purple_gol: After multiple uses of time, it finally recalled how to control its abilities
material.momotinker.reversetime_purple_g: Through countless journeys on the brink of collapse, it was able to awaken its ability to be different and different
material.momotinker.rhythm_slime.encyclo: What does Slime's dance look like
material.momotinker.dragon_jade.encyclop: A huge gem generated with a very low probability within the extremely long-lived EnderDragon
material.momotinker.jujube_wood.encyclop:
Time has passed, and thanks to the tree species left by our ancestors for future generations, Jujube Wood trees have been able to be inherited
Not naturally generated, one needs to delve deep into the ancient city to find saplings
material.momotinker.lightning_strike_woo: Heaven is yang, earth is yin; Thunder and fire are yang, evil spirits are yin
material.momotinker.immortal_weiqi.encyc: The axe is all rotten, and the old friends are also gone
material.momotinker.mountain_river_paint: The freedom in my heart allows me to see the mountains and rivers of the past
modifier.momotinker.lethe.description:
Immunity eliminates all effects of 'end' and attacks the 'none' effect that adds the highest level of level+6 to the enemy
§4[none]§:Clear all other effects and reduce layers by 6% of maximum health every game moment
modifier.momotinker.huangquan.descriptio: When the health is below 60%, the attack power is increased by the value of lost health * 6. When the 'end' effect is obtained, the attack will ignore the defense and the damage increase will be doubled (the long-range damage increase efficiency is 25%)
modifier.momotinker.red.flavor: §4The scenery to which it belongs is nothing§
modifier.momotinker.red.description:
Perceive hostile creatures around, press 'Category Example' while holding the main hand to obtain a 15 second 'end' effect, and the tool enters a 90 second cooldown
§7[end]§:All observed scenes will fade,reduced reaction to injury,and a 12 layer 'none' effect will be added to a large range of organisms for a prolonged period of time. The body's health cannot exceed 1 point
modifier.momotinker.firmheart.descriptio: Charge hostile creatures within the range. When attacking at level 5, consume the charge and deal extra damage to their maximum health * 4, while permanently increasing their maximum health when holding the weapon (0.2% each time, with long-range weapon damage and health growth halved)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.firmheart1: At present, each increase in health can be:
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.firmheart2: At present, the charging damage is:
modifier.momotinker.wildhearts.descripti:
When worn, increase the maximum health by 20 points. If the maximum health exceeds a certain value (default 80), you will receive the 'wild heart' effect. During the duration of the effect, if you receive damage, the effect will disappear and enter an 8-second cooldown.
§a[wild heart]§:Recovers 10% of maximum health per second
modifier.momotinker.infinitevitality.des: Any therapeutic effect received while wearing will increase by 25% (same name only effective once)
modifier.momotinker.feast.description: Obtain the percentage of the highest life limit among the creatures killed by this weapon, with a value of 10%+5% * entry level
modifier.momotinker.overeatingsin.flavor: §2The price of endless devouring: endless hunger§
modifier.momotinker.overeatingsin.descri: Any therapeutic effect received while in the backpack will be reduced by 50% (the same name entry only takes effect once)
modifier.momotinker.intendingplunder.des: Holding this tool in the main hand increases the number of items dropped by killing creatures by 100% at each level
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.intendingplu: The current number of drops has increased:
modifier.momotinker.overweightingwealths: §1The price of endless plunder: the weight of gold§
Reduce the attack speed by 20% of the entry level
modifier.momotinker.vehementdesire.descr: When hit, it gives the same level of 'lost soul' effect, and gains a 40% * level (half ranged) increase in damage when the target has 0 armor. The higher the target's armor, the lower the increase in damage.
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.vehementdesi: The current highest damage increase is:
modifier.momotinker.overindulgencesin.fl: §5The price of endless indulgence: bone and flesh pain and cold§
modifier.momotinker.overindulgencesin.de:
Get a 'lost soul' effect of 20 second entry level every moment while carrying a backpack.
§d[lost soul]§:Reduce total armor by 20% per layer
modifier.momotinker.dominate.description: Each level receives a 70% stack bonus for most attributes. When attacked by monsters with a maximum health lower than their maximum total health level * 20%, they only receive 70% damage (the same name only takes effect once)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.dominate1: The current threshold for triggering damage reduction is:
modifier.momotinker.overdisdainsin.flavo: §4The Price of Endless Contemplation: Thin Lifespan§
modifier.momotinker.overdisdainsin.descr:
Wearing it or holding it in the hands of the primary and secondary players sometimes results in a 'arrogant' effect on the overall level of the entry.
§4[arrogant]§:Reduce maximum health by 10% per layer
modifier.momotinker.drinkblood.descripti: When attacking, if the health is greater than 10% of the maximum life, it will consume 10% of the maximum life and gain a level * 60% damage increase, and restore 30% * level health of the actual damage. If the health is insufficient, it will not be consumed and will be reduced to 10% * level (the entire remote damage recovery process is at 10% * level and does not consume health)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.drinkblood1: The current health consumption for each attack is:
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.drinkblood2: The damage increase in the undegraded state is:
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.drinkblood4: The recoverable amount is the actual damage:
modifier.momotinker.overangersin.flavor: §8The Price of Endless Resentment: The Flame of Wrath erodes the Body§
modifier.momotinker.overangersin.descrip: The main handheld sometimes increases by 10% * any damage received by the entry level
modifier.momotinker.unstained.descriptio: Immunity to all neutral and negative effects while carrying a backpack (except for the Seven Sins series effects). Wearing or holding the backpack may sometimes cause the minecraft' effect time to not return to zero and provide a chance to dodge attacks. The value is 10% of the total entries, with a maximum of 80% (the same name only takes effect once)
modifier.momotinker.overcowardicesin.fla: §6The Price of Endless Fear and Neglect: Micro Force for Battle§
modifier.momotinker.overcowardicesin.des: Wearing or holding the primary and secondary items can sometimes reduce the damage caused, with a value of 5% of the total entries and a maximum of 40% (the same name only takes effect once)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.overcowardic: The current evasion probability has been increased:
modifier.momotinker.grudgeothers.descrip: When attacking, if a certain part of oneself is not equipped with armor while the target has equipment, the opponent's armor in that part will be cleared and dropped at one's own location (not effective for players); When attacking targets with a higher health limit than oneself, the attack power will increase based on the difference.
modifier.momotinker.overenvysin.flavor: §eThe Price of Endless Jealousy and Resentment: Facing Minor and Shallow Evil§
modifier.momotinker.overenvysin.descript: When attacking targets with a lower health limit than oneself, the attack power will be reduced based on the difference, which is 5% * item level * health limit difference (attack does not cause damage at the lowest point)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.overenvysin1: At present, the maximum attack power that can be provided by increasing damage is:
modifier.momotinker.sacrificetospirit.de: When holding this tool, the left button will no longer function. When held, it deals damage to all surrounding creatures every 2 seconds. The original attack speed determines the attack range (up to 200 squares), and the original attack distance and item level determine the damage multiplier of the attack
modifier.momotinker.oversadsin.flavor: §7The Price of Endless Sorrow: Melancholy and Sorrow§
modifier.momotinker.oversadsin.descripti: Holding this tool will cause periodic damage over time, with higher damage occurring over time. The level of the entry will determine the rate of damage growth
modifier.momotinker.fallingstars.descrip:
Press 'Category Example' and lift it into the air. Pressing it again within the next 3 seconds will result in a 1-second 'Falling Star' effect, and the tool will receive 120 seconds of cooldown (if the second skill is not used, it will only have 30 seconds)
§d[Falling Star]§:Quickly sprint and stop when colliding with blocks or hitting entities, producing an explosion that causes explosive type damage to nearby creatures (without damaging the blocks),
modifier.momotinker.unknownreturnee.desc: The damage caused is reduced by 20% * entry level, but the damage will be randomly increased within the range of entry level * (10%--100%)
modifier.momotinker.overcrystalline.desc: Damage corrected to a multiplier of 1.225 ^ enhancement points (ranged to 1.1 ^ enhancement points)
modifier.momotinker.crystallization.desc: When the deputy holds 'Dimensional Prism', pressing 'Category Example' can consume 1 for reinforcement. The higher the current reinforcement level, the lower the probability of success. Failure will be punished when the reinforcement level reaches a certain level, and there is a risk of crushing when the reinforcement level is greater than or equal to 14!
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.crystallizat: The current number of reinforcement points is:
The current success rate of reinforcement is:
The current remote damage increase is:
If the current reinforcement fails, it will be reduced by 1 level!
If the current reinforcement fails, it will be reduced by 4 levels!
Look out!! The current failed reinforcement weapon will disappear!
msg.crystallization3: Strengthening failed! Strengthen the level and reduce it by 1
msg.crystallization4: Strengthening failed! Strengthen the level and reduce it by 4
msg.crystallization5: Strengthening failed! The equipment is disappeared...
modifier.momotinker.frombrilliance.descr: Players are unable to forge independently and can obtain tools with fixed material components at certain locations. Achieving certain conditions can lead to weapon evolution!
A peculiar metal from ancient times that appears ordinary on the surface
The durability consumption of the tool is reduced by 50%, and most attributes are increased by 40%, which may evolve due to certain circumstances
modifier.momotinker.superancientmetalsre: Unique metal from ancient times, exhibiting a unique posture due to the awakening of 'From Brilliance'
The durability consumption of the tool is reduced by 90%, and most attributes are increased by 80%. It will provide unique effects based on the awakening results from 'From Brilliance'
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.degenerate1: [From Brilliance]Certification: Divine Punishment Spear - Stained with Blood
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.degenerate2: This tool attack will ignore armor and will not cause invincible frames.Continuous attacks can temporarily stack attack speed, up to 160%
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.sanctificati: [From Brilliance]Certification: Divine Punishment Spear - Starry Sky
This weapon will permanently add the 'be conquered' mark when attacking monsters, and any damage taken by this monster will be corrected to 180%
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.hadal3: The attack will cause extra damage of 5% of the opponent's maximum life, ignoring armor
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.stellarcore3: Obtain maximum health equal to 60% of armor and armor toughness equal to 30% of armor when held in hand
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.crystallized: When the durability is greater than 5 digits, the damage will be corrected to a multiplier of 1.15 ^ the number of extra digits
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.liverization: Kill creatures to increase points. Each time the points are full, one of the three slots will be obtained. After completion, the points will be cleared and the subsequent required points will be doubled
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.transmit3: When in the backpack, it will increase the duration of the positive potion effect by 100%
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.backtracking: After releasing the teleportation, the owner of this tool will be immune to damage within 12 seconds, and the effect will immediately disappear when dealing damage or destroying blocks
A peculiar metal from ancient times that appears ordinary on the surface
Slow recovery of durability, slowly restoring player life when durability is full,and most attributes are increased by 25%, which may evolve due to certain circumstances
modifier.momotinker.superancientmetalsre: Unique metal from ancient times, exhibiting a unique posture due to the awakening of 'From Brilliance'

Durability quickly recovers, and when the durability is full, players' lives are quickly restored,and most attributes are increased by 60%. It will provide unique effects based on the awakening results from 'From Brilliance'
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.hadal1: [From Brilliance]Certification: Entropy Burning Cube - The Abyss of the Sea
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.hadal2: The movement speed increases, and there is a chance to dodge when attacked. The dodge probability increases by up to 50% with speed
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.stellarcore1: [From Brilliance]Certification: Entropy Burning Cube - Stellar Core
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.stellarcore2: Armor and armor toughness increase,50% increase in damage to burnt or aquatic organisms.When held in hand, it will cause surrounding organisms to burn and suffer damage at regular intervals, and the closer the distance, the higher the damage
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.crystallized: Durability increases, attacks will consume 2% of the current durability and cause extra damage. Every 1 point consumed will increase by 0.25% (default maximum consumption is 600 points)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.liverization: The ability to restore durability and health increases, and even when the durability is not full, life will still be restored.When about to die, an attempt will be made to lose 99% of the maximum durability to avoid this death (it will not take effect if the durability is insufficient)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.degenerate3: When this tool completes a kill, it will permanently increase attack speed and attack damage
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.sanctificati: This weapon has a chance of triggering lightning strikes when attacking
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.transmit4: When this tool is present in the backpack, it will continuously weaken surrounding organisms, making their movements gradually stiff
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.backtracking: When the cooling capacity of the tool is less than 50% of the total duration but not zero, it can still be triggered at the cost of losing 50% of the current maximum life (resetting after death). Current ability triggers maximum cooling:
A peculiar metal from ancient times that appears ordinary on the surface
Most attributes increase by 50%, with an additional 120% increase in durability, which may evolve due to certain circumstances
modifier.momotinker.superancientmetalsre: Unique metal from ancient times, exhibiting a unique posture due to the awakening of 'From Brilliance'
Most attributes increase by 100%, durability increases by an additional 240%.It will provide unique effects based on the awakening results from 'From Brilliance'
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.transmit2: During survival, the majority of the owner's attributes will gradually increase (up to a maximum of 20%), and after death, reset and restart the increase
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.backtracking: After releasing the teleportation, this tool will cause a range strike at the endpoint and restore an additional 40% of lost life
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.hadal4: When carrying a backpack, players will not suffocate. Holding this tool increases damage by 60% during the day and reduces damage by 60% at night
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.stellarcore4: When the tool attacks continuously, it will overheat, gradually reducing the attack speed (up to 90%) and significantly increasing the damage (up to 270%). After a period of no attack, it will quickly recover
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.crystallized: When the durability of armor or weapons is insufficient, the damage caused by the tool will restore its durability
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.liverization: When in the backpack, it will try to record 50% of the damage received, which can be stacked but will quickly decay. When attacking, it will increase the damage this time
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.degenerate4: When attacking, if the target is within 70% -80% of the attack distance, the damage will increase by 120%. The farther the target is from this range, the lower the damage increase, with a minimum of 20%
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.sanctificati: When in the backpack, it will keep the time of the main world daytime, and the entry on the tool will take extra effect once during the attack, but the damage amplification class only has 25% effectiveness
modifier.momotinker.crimsonqueen.descrip: Losing the original slash, it will be replaced by releasing it at a certain time after right clicking to recharge the weapon. When there is a recharge, the attack will consume layers, causing the attack to be corrected to 200% and ignoring armor. The maximum number of layers that can exist is 3 (if a perfect judgment is triggered, 3 layers will be directly obtained)
modifier.momotinker.berserk.description: Press 'Category Example' to switch between normal and berserk states. When worn in a berserk state or held by the primary and secondary players, the damage caused and taken is corrected to 140%+30% * total body entry level
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.berserk2: [Berserk] is activated! The current correction for causing and sustaining damage is:
modifier.momotinker.yamato.description: A 4-strike combo with a slightly shortened cooldown time and 80% damage from a slash. After use, the weapon will experience a 1-second cooldown, but if released within a certain period of time after completing the charge, it will not cool down
modifier.momotinker.starcloudchain.descr: Attacking or being attacked by monsters will add a 'Star Chain' tag to them. When attacking or being attacked by monsters with this tag, other monsters with this tag will receive 20%+10% * of the total body item level damage from this attack (within a square area of 5+3 * item level)
modifier.momotinker.breakthroughstars.fl: 'Divine Punishment Spear' Exclusive Enhancement: Magic Spear Throwing
modifier.momotinker.breakthroughstars.de: Losing the original sprinting ability, instead releasing it after right clicking to accumulate power will consume 5% of the current experience points and launch a magic spear. Touching it will cause attack damage, and the experience consumed will increase its damage
modifier.momotinker.cleansetheworld.desc: It will consume 25% of its current experience points in the sky to summon a huge magic spear (this type of tool will enter a default cooldown of 600 s after use). Touching it will cause 50% damage every moment, and after landing, it will produce a violent explosion and deal 2000% damage to a wide range of creatures.
modifier.momotinker.shadowofdamnation.de: The summoned giant magic spear will pass through blocks and creatures without exploding, and its falling speed will be greatly increased. The damage range touched by it is slightly reduced
modifier.momotinker.drinkingdemon.flavor: Drink the poison of the dove, plant in spring and harvest in autumn
modifier.momotinker.drinkingdemon.descri: Press 'Category Example' to absorb items with enchantments in the assistant, consume the total existing points * 50 points of experience, and obtain corresponding types of points based on the number of enchantments on the item. After use, the tool will cool down for 90 seconds (if experience is insufficient, it cannot be absorbed)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.drinkingdemo: The current experience points are insufficient to use [Drinking Demon]
The current experience points can be used for [Drinking Demon]
Currently reducing the experience consumption of [Drinking Demon]:
modifier.momotinker.sweetaftertaste.desc: When this tool is armor, it will reduce damage based on the total number of mana points on the body's armor; When the tool is a weapon or tool, it will increase melee damage and attack speed based on the number of drinking magic points. If it is a ranged weapon, it will additionally increase arrow damage; Curse points will reduce the experience points required to use the 'Drinking Demon'
modifier.momotinker.expandedequipment.fl: The significance of its existence is...
modifier.momotinker.expandedequipment.de: This tool has weak properties and cannot apply any reinforcement, but it can replace components normally (in some cases, its reinforcement will be cleared, and if the component material has characteristics such as reinforcement points, it will also be cleared)
modifier.momotinker.projectionofsufferin: The overlap between the sun and the moon is...

Recharge over time when in combat mode, and decrease over time 8 seconds after leaving combat. If the tool held by the main hand is not a 'Coronal Key' or 'Eclipse Container', the decrease will be faster; When charging exists, the damage caused by the weapon increases (default maximum is 60%)
modifier.momotinker.ultimatedarkness.fla: Do not mourn, it is inevitable
modifier.momotinker.ultimatedarkness.des: Charging will decrease over time when holding, and if the main holding tool is not a 'Coronal Key' or 'Eclipse Container', it will decrease more quickly; When charged, the damage caused by the weapon increases (default is 60%)
modifier.momotinker.origin.flavor: The starting point of all living beings comes from nothingness, and precisely because of this, they will also return to nothingness
modifier.momotinker.origin.description: Reduced response to injury, attacks ignore defense and reduce the target's maximum health by 20% * level. If the maximum life of the target within the attack range is lower than that of the holder, it will be cleared, and there is a chance that the dropped object will be cleared
modifier.momotinker.significance.flavor: All things exist because of their relationship and meaning, therefore, they should be deprived
modifier.momotinker.significance.descrip: Press 'Category Example' to continuously decay the maximum life of a large range of organisms until death, and all potions on their bodies will be cleared.When the maximum life is less than 300% of the maximum life of the releaser, it will be cleared. The maximum life of the releaser will also decrease, But the speed has significantly decreased
modifier.momotinker.blank.flavor: Like an article, at the end of everything, when the end is terminated, only an unfinished blank remains
modifier.momotinker.blank.description: When the deputy holds the 'Conceptual Endpoint · Nihilism', Press 'Category Example' can consume one item to release the '§k Final Poem §r'(Global cooling for 600s), enter the reading bar, and draw a period on the World Living Chapter at the end of the time (death in the reading bar will be interrupted and enter a cooling period of 300s)
msg.blank1: §oRiver will flow upstream and return to the clouds
msg.blank2: §oThe flying bird will return to its eggshell and form an egg again
msg.blank4: §oYour laughter, tears, love and hate will all sink into eternal 'nothingness'
msg.blank5: §oNo pain, no sorrow, only non-existent peace
msg.blank6: §oI am the writer of 'nothingness', silently composing poems about all things
msg.blank7: §oSleep, creatures, you will no longer exist
modifier.momotinker.flamebath.flavor: Using the energy of shooting stars to envelop oneself
modifier.momotinker.flamebath.descriptio:
Press 'Category Example' while wearing to obtain a 120s 'Flame Bath Armor' effect, with a level of the total worn level and a cooling time of 240s
§6[Flame Bath Armor]:§rObtain 60% * level armor and 40% * level armor toughness during the duration, and repel nearby creatures every 5s
modifier.momotinker.starfallarrow.descri: After the arrow hits the creature, it will summon a shooting star above its head to quickly fall, explode on the ground, and cause range damage
modifier.momotinker.explosivesword.flavo: Concentrate the energy of shooting stars into one sword
modifier.momotinker.explosivesword.descr: Melee attacks will explode once at the target location, causing extra damage (this feature cannot be triggered by extra attacks)
modifier.momotinker.blessingofmeteor.fla: The shooting stars generously bless you
modifier.momotinker.blessingofmeteor.des: Each level receives one slot for each of the three types, and each level receives a 40% stacking bonus for most attributes
modifier.momotinker.abyssalresonance.fla: Listen to the echoes of ancient oceanic bloodlines
modifier.momotinker.abyssalresonance.des: Get a 20% movement speed, the dimension is more prone to rain, and the damage received in water or rain is reduced by a fixed value, which is affected by the total number of entry levels and speed on the body
modifier.momotinker.thermonuclearzone.fl: Wherever they go, not a single blade of grass grows
modifier.momotinker.thermonuclearzone.de: For every creature around that is already on fire, they will receive a temporary 2+armor that is half the total item level on their body. When they receive damage, they will counterattack based on the values of armor and armor toughness
Fragile like a crystal, growing like a crystal

Obtain 25% stackable durability, which will automatically recover and consume 5% of the remaining durability of the equipment on the body, reducing damage (the tool only has 0.2% effectiveness). If the durability consumed is greater than the damage received, the excess durability will be counterattacked
modifier.momotinker.lifeprogram.flavor: Why does the program that imitates life exist...
modifier.momotinker.lifeprogram.descript: The treatment efficiency received increases by 40%+20% * the total number of items on the body. If the life is less than 50%, the treatment efficiency received increases by an additional 100%. If it is less than 25%, it increases by 300%. The total damage received will not exceed 90% of the maximum life
modifier.momotinker.shortterminvestments: When the deputy holds an item, press 'Category Example' will consume a record of the item and increase points. When holding this tool for certain actions, the points will randomly increase or decrease. When the point is greater than 1, pressing the special skill button while empty handed will clear the point and obtain an item equal to the number of points(Default only valid for minecraft' items)
Perhaps it could be a bit longer...

The general function is similar to 'Short Term Investments'. Compared to 'Short Term Investments', the probability of increasing points increases and the probability of decreasing points decreases, but the relative magnitude of growth and decrease is significantly reduced
modifier.momotinker.timeechoes.descripti: When in the backpack, the maximum durability will gradually decrease over time while improving other attributes until the maximum durability is less than 500
modifier.momotinker.polarizedspacetime.f: Crossing disaster risks and advancing with time and space
modifier.momotinker.polarizedspacetime.d: When equipped or held, it will gradually adapt to the same type of damage, and the adaptation speed is related to the level of the whole body entry. The number of damage types that can be adapted to at the same time is related to the number of equipment already equipped with that entry
modifier.momotinker.resonance.descriptio: This entry takes effect when both the main and deputy weapons possess it. When the main hand causes non additional attacks, the secondary weapon will also cause one attack
modifier.momotinker.eternalanger.flavor: Before going to hell, my anger knows no bounds
modifier.momotinker.eternalanger.descrip: hen the main hand holds this tool and is on the brink of death, they can avoid death once and launch a small-scale attack once. The probability of triggering a death free attack next time is halved (the basic probability is 300%), and the damage caused and taken by holding this tool will increase. It will reset after death
modifier.momotinker.slackatmosphere.flav: The slight drunkenness, like whiskey, can't help but make people addicted and unable to extricate themselves
modifier.momotinker.slackatmosphere.desc: The level of negative potion effects obtained by all surrounding creatures is doubled (including oneself), and the level of positive potion effects obtained by all non self creatures is halved. Give the target/attacker a random negative potion effect when attacking/being attacked
modifier.momotinker.thepinnacleofarrogan: [Resonance of major sin]The Pinnacle Of Arrogance
I once stood on the dome, overlooking the vast beings

The minimum damage received by equipment or holder is 5% of their maximum life, and the maximum damage received is 15% of their maximum life. If the damage exceeds 2500% of their maximum life, it will not take effect
modifier.momotinker.filledwithhunger.fla: With the stove of heaven and earth, I am the kitchen for the food
modifier.momotinker.filledwithhunger.des: The satiety and hunger levels will rapidly and naturally decrease. Killing will restore satiety and hunger levels and can break through the upper limit. The satiety and hunger values can be considered as extra health and increase the damage caused. Exceeding the upper limit of satiety/hunger values can immunize against death and clear the excess satiety/hunger values
modifier.momotinker.resentmentknives.fla: Have you ever thought that you are also hated by the world, someone who hates the world
modifier.momotinker.resentmentknives.des:
When holding, attacking/being attacked will mark oneself as 'jealous' of the target/attacker. If the opponent's attack is greater than oneself, the self attack will increase to the opponent's level, and the damage caused to them will penetrate the defense; If it is less than, it will increase the opponent's attack to its own level.
'jealous': Each pair of organisms can only exist in one state at a time, and the damage caused and suffered by other organisms to units in that state will be greatly reduced until one of them dies or is far apart
modifier.momotinker.forbiddenfruit.flavo: Perhaps we shouldn't have eaten that fruit from the beginning
modifier.momotinker.forbiddenfruit.descr: Holder attacks will directly reduce the target's armor value and increase armor. Creatures with armor lower than the holder within the range will experience a 50% reduction in most attributes. Units with armor lower than the holder's will receive increased damage from the holder and reduced damage to the holder (up to 95% reduction in damage)
modifier.momotinker.gainsalone.flavor: No matter the cost, just for this obsession
modifier.momotinker.gainsalone.descripti: This tool will reduce most attributes and significantly increase maintenance and durability consumption. Each kill or dig caused by this tool will increase the penalty by one level and double the number of dropped objects generated on the original basis (removing the enhancement will only cancel the penalty, and hitting it again will inherit the penalty level) (it will not take effect when the remaining durability is too low)
modifier.momotinker.compassionateeveryth: We sympathize with all living beings in the world because of their hardships

When holding, both your attacks and the attacks you receive will ignore the defense. When held, it will convert the damage caused to a temporary maximum health and reset the damage to zero. If the maximum health of the target during the attack is less than the temporary health of the holder, it will be directly killed and an equal amount of temporary health will be consumed
modifier.momotinker.slimeresonance.flavo: The idol of the slime family?
modifier.momotinker.slimeresonance.descr: Each level of this entry will increase all features on the tool that have the [Over Slime Friend] tag by 2 levels
modifier.momotinker.slimerhythm.descript: Rhythmic attacks will restore a certain amount of slime coating, and when held for a long time, it will trigger an additional feature on the equipment that has the [Over Slime Friend] tag (if it is a ranged attack, it will not trigger damage amplification)
modifier.momotinker.slimerhythma.descrip: Rhythmically receiving damage will restore a certain amount of mucus coating to your armor. When held for a long time, it will consume the mucus coating of your entire armor to reduce damage
modifier.momotinker.rare_crystals.flavor: Where is there any material that can be directly created like this
modifier.momotinker.rare_crystals.descri: The attribute of the equipment will decrease with the proportion of components that possess the material. When the equipment has this entry, it strengthens the [Material Reforging], and the benefits it obtains will not be limited by level and each benefit will be doubled
modifier.momotinker.dragon_source.flavor: It is said that the various abilities of dragons come from the energy release of dragon jade
modifier.momotinker.dragon_source.descri: Immunity to receive no source damage, increase some attributes, and enable equipment operators to fly
modifier.momotinker.ancient_bloodline.fl: The origin of dragons can be traced back far
modifier.momotinker.ancient_bloodline.de: It will increase the damage caused and decrease the damage received based on the total game duration (up to 95% damage reduction) (the same name only applies once)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.ancient_bloo: The damage increase provided by [Ancient Bloodline] is:
The provided damage reduction measures are:
modifier.momotinker.material_reforging.f: Reasonable construction is the key to maximizing its effectiveness
modifier.momotinker.material_reforging.d: This enhancement will improve most attributes, and their values will be randomly selected within a certain range. The more enhancements there are, the larger the minimum and maximum values in this range will be, with a maximum limit of 5 levels (re applying this enhancement will only randomize the attributes and will not increase the minimum and maximum values)
modifier.momotinker.tooltip.material_ref: [Material Remaking] Currently, additional attributes have been provided:
The current range that can be randomly selected is:[
modifier.momotinker.suppressing_evil.fla: It is said to be rich in yang energy
modifier.momotinker.suppressing_evil.des: The basic damage dealt to undead creatures at each level will be increased by 25%
modifier.momotinker.suppressing_evil_a.f: It is said to be rich in yang energy
modifier.momotinker.suppressing_evil_a.d: In worn armor, each level reduces damage from undead creatures by 20% and magic damage by 10% (up to 95% and independently)
modifier.momotinker.ward_off_evil.flavor: Trees absorb the power of lightning and can break down all impurities
modifier.momotinker.ward_off_evil.descri: Increases damage to monsters by 25% at each level. If the target is a undead creature, the bonus should be doubled by four times
modifier.momotinker.ward_off_evil_a.flav: Trees absorb the power of lightning and can break down all impurities
modifier.momotinker.ward_off_evil_a.desc: In worn armor, each level reduces damage from monsters and magic by 20% (up to 95%). If the creature is a undead creature, maximize its damage reduction and immune it to damage that is less than 25% of its maximum life
modifier.momotinker.thunder_decree.flavo: Legend has it that when Tian Gong was patrolling the human world in a fire sedan, he accidentally collided with it while getting off
modifier.momotinker.thunder_decree.descr: The damage caused is reduced by 40%. The attack caused an extra magical damage
modifier.momotinker.thunder_decree_a.fla: Legend has it that when Tian Gong was patrolling the human world in a fire sedan, he accidentally collided with it while getting off
modifier.momotinker.thunder_decree_a.des: When attacked, deal magical damage equivalent to 40% of the damage value to the attacker. If the damage received is magic damage, the counterattack damage will ignore magic defense and double the counterattack amount. If the target is a undead creature, the counterattack damage will increase by an additional 20% of the maximum sum of their own and the target's lives
modifier.momotinker.years_in_weiqi.flavo: One day in the mountains, it has been a thousand years in the world
modifier.momotinker.years_in_weiqi.descr: Handholding this tool will gradually accelerate the movement of blocks within the surrounding 8 squares, and reach the maximum acceleration value after 361 seconds. When accelerating, it will accelerate the consumption of one's own satiety, and the acceleration will fail when the satiety is 0 (be cautious when using it together with other acceleration modules such as [Time in a bottle standalone])
modifier.momotinker.memories_of_mountain: Traveling thousands of miles with the mountains, the journey is endless

After hitting the creature, try to move the target to the [Mountains Memory] dimension. This dimension does not naturally generate monsters, and the creature will receive damage every once in a while while while in this dimension. After the creature dies, the loot will fall to the player's position
(This feature involves 'ChunkPos Forced Loading', which may cause lag when applied to too many organisms that have not died)
